name: Enter the vortex: Loot or die
name_original: Enter the vortex: Loot or die
description:
You wake up in an apparently desert island, with nothing equipped. Soon you realize everything in the island will try to kill you. There’s only one way to escape, kill their boss:
Loot weapons and items in order to defeat the big boss and their mischevous minions. You can summon the boss by going to the central ruins or try to get better weapons as the waves of enemies approach until it is the boss’ turn.

Controls (pad): Move with the left stick. Direct your player with the right stick. RB/LB: Dash. Right trigger: Melee Attack. Left trigger: Secondary Attack.

Controls (Keyboard): Move with WASD. Direct your player with the mouse position. Shift: Dash. Left click: Melee Attack. Right click: Secondary Attack.

Esc to exit ;)
